title: The Wealth Inequality Reader
description: Wealth is distributed more unequally in the United States today than at any time since the twenties. Does it matter? The authors of The Wealth Inequality Reader answer this question with a resounding yes. In the thoroughly revised and expanded third edition, 42 substantive, engaging essays explore the hidden vector of wealth its causes, its consequences, and strategies for change. an illustrated overview offers the latest statistics on wealth inequality in a series of one-page snapshots. The essential reader on wealth inequality.
author: Dollars & Sense Collective
